name: More or Less Entirely Seedless Watermelon
name_original: More or Less Entirely Seedless Watermelon
description:
Melonpeckers love melons! :)

But they also don't like seeds :(

Instructions:

1. Pinch the seeds to launch them into your opponents melon!
2. When you've got your watermelon cleared up, eat it!

Made by PREEPS!
